/* globals __webpack_amd_options__ */
module.exports = __webpack_amd_options__;
module.exports = require('events').EventEmitter;
module.exports = null;

const locale: IGanttLocale = {
	date: {

		link: "Link",

		minutes: "Minutes",

	}
};
